metadata.title: CVE-2018-19869 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.11.3. A malformed SVG image causes asegmentation fault in qsvghandler.cpp.

criterions.comment: qtsvg-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qt4-x11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
